name: Joyce
about: Hi! My name is Joyce Keithley, owner and stylist at Wildflower Salon! I specialize in gray coverage and gray blending utilizing color and blonding, as well as a wide variety of hair extensions! I am skilled in specialized cutting techniques, including curly cuts! I have been behind the chair since 2009 and have been a salon owner since 2021. I am an NWA native I am so blessed to be able to have a career that I am truly passionate about right here in my hometown! I canâ€™t wait to see you in my chair!
